slides.title: Hey there, let me introduce myself
slides.description: I'm Diego Merello, proud father, humble husband, passionate designer, wanna be musician, recidivist griller

slides.title: Iconic design masters molded my vision
slides.description: Design culture grew up in me at the Politecnico di Milano, during workshops with Giovanni Anceschi, Bob Noorda, Giovanni Baule, Sebastiano Bagnara. The one-year experience at the Escola Elisava in Barcelona triggered my interest in technology as creativity inspiration.

tips.title: Politecnico di Milano
tips.description: I graduated with top honors from the Politecnico di Milano, specializing in Interface Design at Design Faculty. I lived in an in-depth exploration of design culture, embodying the qualities that have distinguished the best designers across all fields.

tips.title: Escola Elisava
tips.description: During a year of studies in Barcelona for the Erasmus project, the passion for interface design mixed with an interest in coding and experimentation. I was fascinated by the possibility of creating a new way of thinking about design and engeneering.

slides.title: Working in digital design since 2000
slides.description: I started with my small personal company during Italy's digital communication boom. After 3 years, with Andrea, Michele and Nicola, we created WIP Italia, a digital design company that has been developing products for renowned Italian and international brands since 2003

tips.title: My working day in WIP Italia
tips.description: At WIP Italia, I supervise the User Experience team and I provide consulting to our clients for the design and development of digital products, combining the strong technical skills of our developers with the choices of our designers.

tips.title: The Digital Design Company
tips.description: WIP Italia specializes in Digital Design, focusing on User Experience, Content Creation, and the development of B2C and B2B digital products. Our work spans from analyzing needs and behaviors to producing videos, content, and code.

slides.title: Music is just my little dream world
slides.description: I love to create songs about people i'm fond of. I play bass, guitar, some choords in piano and I sing like a dog in the shower. My music generates a serious sense of embarrassment in those who listen to it.

tips.title: Bass, Guitar and other stuff
tips.description: I've been playing guitar and bass for many years, but no bands, except for occasionally joining in with some more serious musician friends.

tips.title: Are you brave? listen to me
tips.description: Yes, I often regret it, but I write songs. You can listen to them on SoundCloud, but don't expect much.

slides.title: Barbecue is probably my life approach
slides.description: People, noise, music, the aroma of grilled meat and charcoal, plenty of beer, and countless children surround the establishment that, by God's grace, my family regularly frequents.

tips.title: grill & beer is creativity gasoline
tips.description: Forging friendships one rib after another, no project can replace the creativity of the unexpected that can happen in front of a grill

tips.title: 4 women (and a stupid cat)
tips.description: 4 women, 3 of them teenagers, silence is not something familiar in my house. Glitch (the stupid cat) endures them silently, which is why he is noteworthy.
